channel.title: App-Based Driver Wages on FinanClub

item.title: LYFT
item.description: score:135 Chances: Shares of ride sharing service Lyft jumped 5.4% in the afternoon session after major indices rose LYFT is set to thrive in the growing rideshare market, buoyed by competitive pricing and cost-cutting measures On the surface level, ridesharing service provider Lyft seems like an attractive, undervalued alternative to sector king Uber With the economy on a recovery trek, the smaller competitor could ride coattails Risks: The company’s liquidity position raises major concerns Lyft and Uber have said they will halt operations in Minneapolis because of a new city ordinance that increase wages for app-based drivers If broader conditions become squeezed, the ridesharing industry could become commoditized Score:135 chances characters count - risks characters count = 135
